* Brand: Dell
* Make : Inspiron
* Model: B130/1300
* Website: www.dell.com

=== Current Issues ===
Gutsy Gibbon 7.10 final tested. Monitor, 3D acceleration,and right alt work correctly.

Hibernation switch (Fn + F1) still fails. Software hibernate (button from menu) still works. 

ExpressCard port, VGA port, and dialup port are currently untested.
